SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORTERMINATEPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Defines a stored procedure that is used within the business process .NET CLR code to retrieve the instance parameters for a given id. See D4CampaignBusinessProcess.vb
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORTERMINATEPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS ( @ID uniqueidentifier ) as begin -- do work begin try select spterm_process.IDSETREGISTERID -- bp_view.ID as OUTPUTVIEWID from dbo.USR_SPONSORTERMINATE_BUSINESSPROCESS spterm_process --join -- dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSVIEW bp_view on spterm_process.QUERYVIEWID = bp_view.QUERYVIEWCATALOGID where spterm_process.ID = @ID end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1; end catch end
